basic.description:
An exploration of topics in the social, cultural, political and economic history of Ireland from the Rising of 1798 onwards.
LEARNING HOURS    180 (36S;144P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Topics Irish History, 1798 to the Present

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
